data.author: Pierre Crette

changelog.release_notes:
v1.6
Battery usage improved by removing second hand and having the watch do nothing all minutes long. From 3.5 days to 5.5 days in my own usage.
BlueTooth alert. It seems usefull to me now since I mute my phone.
v1.5 Battery optimisation to keep our Pebble far from a plug longer
V 1.4. Work on both basalte and aplite.
BigAnalog White 1.3 includes a move of date cadran around quarter past X.

Bug correction on day.
Hide day or weekday when hand come above.

Big Analog White is a watchface for people like me that requires glasses to read small characters. Big date, long hands and neat design are the moto of this watchface. Also, no BT or weather here in case you want to wear your pebble disconnected.
This v1.1 version uses white background and colorful hands.

data.description: Big Analog watchface is a watchface for people like me that requires glasses to read small characters. Big date, long hands and neat design are the moto of this watchface. Also BT alert and watch battery.

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.6
Battery usage improved by removing second hand and having the watch do nothing all minutes long. From 3.5 days to 5.5 days in my own usage.
BlueTooth alert. It seems usefull to me now since I mute my phone.

data.title: BIG ANALOG WHITE
